alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 06 at 7:59PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Wood, western Portage and southwestern Marathon Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 758 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Loyal to 8 miles east of Hatfield to 6 miles northwest of Cataract. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail and heavy downpours. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Spencer and Marshfield around 815 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Babcock, Pittsville, Wisconsin Rapids, Mosinee and Lake Wazeecha. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
